Text.Page:
All right, I'll stay here and keep searching for anything that can create a cure.

Researching the ecosystem is as important as rescuing the villagers. If we can make a cure, we can save everyone who's suffering from the crystallization.

And, can you do me a favor?"What can I do?"

First, I need fresh jewel glands.

All of the glands we found before were dry.

Now that we're up here, if we can get a fresh one, it just might give me some ideas on the cure.
Please get those glands for me!

Thank you so much ! I wonder how much different it is from the one I examined at home.

Now, let me take a look and tell you what to get next.
Please gather more glands. I need lots of samples.
